thread.title: Glencore Production Cuts Bolster Commodity Prices
thread.title_full: Glencore Production Cuts Bolster Commodity Prices - WSJ

author: Ese Erheriene
title: Glencore Production Cuts Bolster Commodity Prices
text:
The troubles of commodities giant Glencore PLC are benefiting global markets as the company shuts down its supply of many actively traded commodities from zinc to copper, sparking rallies in these resources.
The gains, however, are often short lived, with investors soon returning to the view that most commodity markets are oversupplied at a time when demand is falling. For Glencore’s actions to have a lasting effect, other miners must follow. But many analysts believe that this won’t happen in a way big enough to push...
